page.title: 04HOUSING_MODERN
page.content: My name is Stephen and I live in a{new {house}near the bottom of the{Coppice.} the Coppice is a big hill.There is a park,bowling green and a tennis court.I have a very modern house which was built in 1983.Inside there are nine rooms but we only use 8 and the other roomfor storage.my house is made of bricks and inside the walls are plaster-board covered with wallpaper. On the floor are carpets and curtains at the windows for when it goes dark. There are around 200 houses on our estate and I live in the first house. My house has a living room,dining room,utility room,three bedrooms,a spare room and two bathrooms.We also have a built-in garage and a shed at the side.The shed is on the tarmac.We have two drives and a garden with panel fencing round. Stephen Popplewell
